name: WildRoots Festival 2025
description: Your digital companion for the Sustainable Living & Wellness Festival experience

events.title: Morning Yoga & Meditation
events.description: Start your festival day with mindful movement and meditation in nature. Open to all levels.
events.speaker: Maya Thompson

events.title: Building Your Sustainable Home
events.description: Learn practical tips for creating an eco-friendly living space that reduces your environmental footprint.
events.speaker: Dr. Green Thompson

events.title: Plant-Based Cooking Workshop
events.description: Discover delicious plant-based recipes using local, seasonal ingredients. Tasting included!
events.speaker: Chef Maria Santos

map.description: Navigate the festival grounds and discover all the amazing locations

locations.description: Main stage for wellness and meditation sessions

vendors.description: Discover sustainable brands and local artisans

about.title: About WildRoots Festival
about.mission: Connecting communities through sustainable living and wellness practices
about.description: WildRoots Festival is a celebration of sustainable living, wellness, and community connection. Join us for three days of workshops, talks, and experiences that inspire positive change.

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: We're committed to creating a zero-waste festival experience and promoting environmental consciousness.

values.title: Community
values.description: Building connections between like-minded individuals who share a passion for sustainable living.

values.title: Wellness
values.description: Promoting holistic health through mindfulness, movement, and natural healing practices.

values.title: Education
values.description: Empowering attendees with knowledge and tools to live more sustainably in their daily lives.

faq.question: Is the festival family-friendly?
faq.answer: Yes! We welcome families and have special activities for children throughout the weekend.

faq.question: What should I bring?
faq.answer: Bring a reusable water bottle, comfortable walking shoes, and an open mind ready to learn and connect.

faq.question: Is parking available?
faq.answer: Yes, we have free parking available. We also encourage carpooling and biking to the festival.

faq.question: Are pets allowed?
faq.answer: Service animals are welcome. For other pets, please check our pet policy on our website.
